sub_title: Youth Leadership & Education Officer @GCA | LL.M. in Law & Sustainable Development @UNIMI
summary:
Former UNFCCC Adaptation Division intern. Previously involved in youth engagement with multilateralism and the 2030 Agenda via MSOI – United Nations Youth Association of Italy, the youth wing of SIOI – UNA Italy.
I gained experience in youth-led international environmental movements with Earth Advocacy Youth, an incredible impact group of young activists committed to advance the Rights of Nature and other ecocentric legal solutions.

My current personal and academic interests include geoengineering, international environmental law and ethics, and international responses to climate breakdown, with a focus on adaptation.
Always willing to engage in discussions about international climate action. Feel free to contact me with ideas, curiosities, or concerns, as well as to share opportunities for youth activism in climate adaptation!
